modName: Van Fang - Male Imperial Save Game
summary: Straight out of Helgen, Van Fang can play anyway you wish.. Personally i chose the Vampire lifestyle.. but it\'s up to you.
descriptionHtml:
This is my personal favorite, Van Fang who was originally intended to be a Vampire Hunter, but after discovering Belua Sanguinare Revisited, i just had to lead him down the road of Darkness.

However the save game starts straight from Helgen, and he\'s disease free so he can be played anyway you want, However: In order for him to look like the pictures, you will need these mods installed:  

1. Natural Eyes - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589 

2. High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4141

3. Dalls_Skyrim_Scars - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4550 

I know it\'s a classic that noone ever listens to, but the Read Me file is there in the download if you have any problems. 

Enjoy, AD.
author: AmadeusDean
